fpmExplorer:Page.title: Page
fpmExplorer:Page.introduction: The Page building block enables you to create a custom page with a pre-defined layout.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Using the Page Building Block
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: You can use the Page building block to create a new page. You can configure the content of the building block as per your requirements.
